nodes.text: Uulshos Manufacturing was the manufacturer of many repulsorlift vehicles as well as space yachts, but are best known for the LAVr QH-7 Chariot and Storm Skimmer Patrol Sled. They have had limited commercial success as many of their designs are unexceptional and are built for small planetary militias and defense forces. They also produced the Uulshos justice droid.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the service droids of the company turned against the crew of a valuable freighter.
